title: Manchester City forward Marlos Moreno joins Flamengo on loan
description: Brazilian side Flamengo say they have signed Manchester City forward Marlos Moreno on loan until the end of 2018.
content: The 21-year-old had been on loan at Girona since the beginning of the season, but made only four appearances for the Spanish side.Moreno was signed by City in August 2016 for £4.75m from Colombian side Atletico Nacional.He has failed to make a single appearance for Pep Guardiola's side, however, and also spent time on loan at Deportivo.Moreno departed Colombia after winning the Copa Libertadores with Atletico Nacional - the South American equivalent of the Champions League.He has made eight appearances for Colombia, scoring once.
